price: Aadamis Gooftaa isaa irraa jechoota fudhatee, sana booda [Rabbiin] dhiifama isaaf godhe. Dhugumatti, Inni (Rabbiin) Isatu akkaan tawbaa qeebalaa, akkaan rahmata godhaadha.
arabic: فَتَلَقَّىٰٓ ءَادَمُ مِن رَّبِّهِۦ كَلِمَٰتٖ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fatalaqqā ādamu min rabbihi kalimātin fatāba ʿalayhi innahu huwa al-tawābu al-raḥīmu
